questions.question: Which of the following does not belong to the instruments of plane table?
For obtaining high precision values, which among the following is used?
Orientation of table involves which among the following?
In which of the following cases, orientation by back sighting is used?

answers.b: When second point is available for orientation
answers.c: When it is not possible to set instrument over station mark
answers.d: When speed is important than accuracy
